Text:
Irrigates land around it.
Does not use water for tiles that it can't Irrigate
With less than a third of Earth covered in water, irrigation became a must.
Comment: The game is set on Earth turned into a dry wasteland.

Text:
Irrigates More land around it and can boost tree growth with extract.
Does not use water for tiles that it can't Irrigate

Irrigates around it without any worker needed. For more Water usage it also blocks contamination.
Does not use water for tiles that it can't Irrigate
With less than a third of Earth covered in water, irrigation became a must.
Comment: The game is set on Earth turned into a dry wasteland.

Text:
Irrigates even More land around it for less Water. 
Blue Pipe indicate starting point of irrigation.
Does not use water for tiles that it cant Irrigate

Irrigates even More land around it for less Water. 
Yellow Pipe indicate starting point of irrigation.
Does not use water for tiles that it cant Irrigate
Здесь можно хранить много питьевой воды, а ещё построить что-нибудь сверху.

Comment: Я использую слово дамба для levee и плотина для dam. На трекере игры объяснял почему.

Text:
Труба с дамбами с обеих сторон и встроенным насосом.\nНасосу нужно подключение к энергосети.
Do not place Levees in hex above the Output Pipe! it will crash!

Труба с дамбами с обеих сторон и встроенным насосом, проложенная под землёй в середине.\nНасосу нужно подключение к энергосети.
Do not place Levees in hex above the Output Pipe! it will crash!

Двойная дамба с насосом и выводом трубы с другой стороны.\nНасосу нужно подключение к энергосети.
Do not place Levees in hex above the Output Pipe! it will crash!
Дамба со встроенным силовым валом для подключения насосов.\nПередаёт энергию вертикально и горизонтально.
Насос для размещения на дне водоёма.

Levee that has shaft in it to power pumps.
Connected to all sides

High Volume Pump Two Levees and a input and output pipe.
Leeve need to be powered but also act as transfer
Do not place Levees in hex above the Output Pipe! it will crash!
Water wheel that also has a sloped Levee to help keep water inside channels and not overspill

High Power version with a Levees on both sides of the pipe and a input and output pipe.
Pipe going underground between Levees
Leeve need to be powered but also act as transfer
Do not place Levees in hex above the Output Pipe! it will crash!

Oneway Valve with levee in the middle
No power needed and does not transfer
1.5cms max flow

High Volume Oneway Valve with levee in the middle
No power needed and does not transfer
Aqueduct with wall on one side. Also Stops water at the bottom.
Aqueduct with wall on Both sides. Also Stops water at the bottom.
Aqueduct with wall on two sides to create a corner. Also Stops water at the bottom.
Adds a lid that block water from ecaping
Do not block water but may help the Illusion that it does for aesthetics to inner corners.
A unidirectional, automated water discharge. in Aqueduct theme and placeable in Aqueducts if it has support under.
Aqueduct with wall on two sides to create a corner. Also Stops water at the bottom.
Aqueduct with wall on three sides to create a corner. Also Stops water at the bottom.
Block water from enter the same block as this, can be used to build underwater paths
A small turbine that generates power in the same direction as the shaft
